Adcs can get that though. Their build is so versatile that it doesn't have to only be the build OP posted. 
They often do get armor from GA. 
They can get merc skimitar for MR. 
ATTACK DAMAGE carries don't need magic pen.
ADCs sometimes can go lethality effectively (MF, Jhin, and Draven especially).
Rapidfire cannon is heavy range poke on top of what their kits already give. 
You're right, no hp. 
Phantom dancer gives huge damage reduction.

It's a vicious cycle. Support items, heals, shields, etc. all have been buffed over time because damage from nearly every source in the game has crept up over time. I'd be glad to see support stuff nerfed alongside damaging abilities/items/runes(in general, not ADC specifically). The game as a whole would be in a healthier place if being at full health meant something again.
